version_description:
1.年账单终于来了，盘点2015，看我的生活有多花样；
2.新增［拜年红包］，小额吉利红包发发发，群发拜年就用它；
3.群红包新增［中文口令］，个人定制夸人夸己不再愁；
4.新增［咻一咻］功能，寻找附近的商户和朋友；
5.新增［吱口令］功能，在支付宝轻松添加好友、建群；
6.优化刷脸登录体验，开通更简单 ，点头登录只需一秒。

1.客户端启动速度大幅提升；
2.新增［咻一咻］功能，寻找附近的商户和朋友；
3.新增［吱口令］功能，在支付宝轻松添加好友、建群；
4.群红包新增［中文口令］，个人定制夸人夸己不再愁。

1.口碑频道全新改版，推荐更贴心，内容更丰富；
2.商家详情页全新改版，优惠买单更方便；
3.生活圈支持纯文字分享；
4.修复已知bug。

为了获得更好的用户体验，支付宝会在 App Store 中定期更新应用，建议打开 iPhone 手机“设置”-“iTunes Store与App Store”-“自动下载的项目”，确保第一时间体验更好的支付宝。

本次更新：
1.优化扫一扫识别效果，识别速度更快；
2.新增下拉通知插件，支付转账更迅速；
3.响应央行监管要求，保障用户权益，优化服务体验；
4.修复已知 bug。

本次更新：
1.愚人节的“到位”终于上线了! 首发上海，其他城市陆续开通中，敬请期待；
2.口碑频道栏目全新上线，为您推荐最新、最热的品质好店，吃喝玩乐玩转生活；
3.口碑店铺页全新改版，商家相册、推荐菜一目了然，使用更方便；
4.校园生活改版，新增话题模块，以及社团、兼职、学生惠等服务；                             
5.支持城市服务搜索，公积金查询、违章查询等一搜即得。

本次更新：
1.口碑1212优惠5折起，吃喝玩乐全搞定！

8.“我的”页面全新改版。

At Alipay, we constantly update our app to ensure the best in class service for our users. Enjoy our latest features by allowing Alipay to update automatically.
Enable “Updates” in “Settings”-“iTunes & App Store” of your iPhone / iPad.

Recent Updates:
1.Alipay uses Augmented Reality to make sending/receiving Red Envelopes much more exciting. You can now scan any object and send it as a map to your friends. Your friends will have to check the map and scan the same object in order to open the red envelope;
2.The AR functionality can be also accessed through the Scan function, directly.

At Alipay, we constantly update our app to ensure the best in class service for our users. Enjoy our latest features by allowing Alipay to update automatically.
Enable “Updates” in “Settings”-“iTunes & App Store” of your iPhone / iPad.

Latest Updates:
1. The Collect functionality (used to receive money), is now on the Home Screen.

Thanks for using Alipay! We’re constantly working on new features and improvements to ensure you enjoy the best cashless & lifestyle experience. We have added ‘Fortune’, a brand new tab on Alipay homepage, to enjoy a one-stop wealth management experience.

Recent Updates:
1. 'Ant Forest' feature is now available in English. Collect energy to plant trees and protect the environment.
2. Double 12 2017 edition - special visuals and promotions.

Refer friends to enjoy rewards. Invite a friend and get a 10 RMB reward. New users get a 10 RMB red envelope. Invite friends to enjoy the convenience of Alipay together.

To ensure a better user experience, Alipay updates will be released regularly. It is recommended to go to Settings > iTunes & App Store > Automatic Downloads and enable Alipay updates.

Here comes the new version of Alipay:
The brand-new widget Love and Welfare for iOS is available.On the home screen of your mobile phone, slide rightwards and tap Edit to add it. Love and Welfare presents the latest information about your Ant Forest, Ant Farm, and Sports clearly and enables easy access to these items.
For the best user experience, Alipay is regularly updated in the App Store. It is recommended to go to Settings > iTunes & App Store > Automatic Downloads and enable Alipay updates.

Here comes the new version of Alipay:
Pay offline with Alipay for a total of "20 days" in December to win your share of a "jackpot of up to CNY 100 million".
Payment conducted with Alipay in buses, subways, supermarkets, farmers' markets, coffee shops, convenient stores, and roadside stalls will all add up to the count of payment days.
For the best user experience, Alipay is regularly updated in the App Store. It is recommended to go to Settings > iTunes & App Store > Automatic Downloads and enable Alipay updates.

Here comes the new version of Alipay:
We have offered more convenient transaction statistics. Open the Alipay app, and tap Me in the lower-right corner. On the Me page, tap Transactions. In the lower-right corner of the Transactions page, tap Statistics. On the page that appears, you can clearly view the statistics of your monthly or yearly transactions. In addition, the charts on the page display the automatic analysis results of your transactions.
For the best user experience, Alipay is regularly updated in the App Store. It is recommended to go to Settings > iTunes & App Store > Automatic Downloads and enable Alipay updates.

Here comes the new version of Alipay:
Search for "My Family" in Alipay and invite your family to jointly accumulate family credits. You can exchange your credits for benefits free of charge. Take benefits home!
Scan for Translation is available! When you scan menus and signboards in foreign languages, Alipay immediately translates them into your native language. Alipay, a good translator when you travel abroad!
For the best user experience, Alipay is regularly updated in the App Store. It is recommended to go to Settings > iTunes & App Store > Automatic Downloads and enable Alipay updates.

We have added Payment Collection Assistant to Notifications. The assistant provides you with clear collection records and detailed statistics.

Here comes the new version of Alipay:
We have updated the My Credit page of Huabei,making it possible to manage different types of quotas. You can check the total quota, used quota, and consumption details with ease.
We have made Huabei quotas easier to use.You can apply for different types of temporary quotas at the same time. You can also change the priorities of quotas, so that temporary quotas can be used first.Even more types of dedicated quotas will become available. Please stayed tuned.
We have updated the Fortune Column section on the Fortune tab.You can catch up with financial trends, read articles, and learn from experts' analysis. You can also participate in discussion and communication in real time.
For the best user experience, Alipay is regularly updated in the App Store. It is recommended to go to Settings > iTunes & App Store > Automatic Downloads and enable Alipay updates.

Alipay Double 11 special addition coming soon! Update the app to win a red envelope:
1. Collect codes on Alipay to celebrate Double 11 and win red envelopes from Nov. 1 to Nov. 10.
2. Electronic invoices can be viewed in My Pocket. More convenient invoice management.
3. Optimized search function. From the home page, search Ant Check for some surprises.

Meanwhile, our hot referral program is still ongoing. Invite new users to win prizes. The more friends you invite, the more you win! New users also enjoy new rights and benefits! Invite friends now to enjoy the convenience of Alipay together.
